# edgecenter_keypair (Resource)

Represent a ssh key, do not depends on region



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `public_key` (String)
- `sshkey_name` (String)

### Optional

- `project_id` (Number)
- `project_name` (String)

### Read-Only

- `fingerprint` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `sshkey_id` (String)
